version_description:
Here are a few of the great new features we’ve added in this version of UltraSync!

- More Camera Settings Like Resolution, Clip Length, Night Vision, and More
- Help Video Section
- A New Way to Invite Others to Join Your UltraSync System
- Optimized Device Management
- BETA Mode to Help Us Test Some Future Features
- And More!

Every update to the UltraSync app includes the typical bug fixes, stability, and performance improvements

We're continuing our push to add even more features and benefits to the UltraSync Mobile App!

Here are a few of the new features added in this release!
- Brand New Setup Wizard for Professional Dealers.
- Optimization for iOS 11 and iPhone X.
- New BETA features for Live Video we hope to launch soon!

Every Update to the UltraSync App includes the typical bug fixes, stability, and performance improvements.

We’re excited to announce the 10th consecutive release of new features on the UltraSync+ Mobile App!

Here are the highlights of this release:
- UltraSync Doorbell Camera Support
- More Camera Settings including brightness, contrast, etc…
- 2-Way Audio Support for Cameras
- Motion Detection on Cameras
- And Much More!

Every Update to the UltraSync+ App includes the typical bug fixes, stability, and performance improvements.

Improved push notification sound
Bug fix for Thermostats integration
Improved connection status display
Other bug fixes and stability improvement

Keyword search for sites list.
Special Push Notification ring tone for alarm events.
Other bug fixes and enhancements

- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Updated for iOS 12 or later devices

Added SMS notifications for selected event groups in the ZeroWire panel
Minor bug fixes and performance improvement
Support for iOS14 devices
